entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -29.9°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
